The professor is not giving the proper marks to student also behavior is not good regarding student for some not all
I advice to student dont take this professor .

I had a awful experience with this professor.  Was extremely unconsiderate professor and had no great skill of teaching in general. I found her unprofessional by using unappropriate example in class and clearing students were not comfortable. Lastly does not mark assignments in a timely matter, please don't take this professor at cost.
Naghmeh was kind and very passionate about her work. I really enjoyed my classes with her!
Arrogant, gives me least grade out of my courses, although i pay my full attention.  Egoistic
Worst proff ever. Failing is better than attending her course

Naghmeh was very clear of her expectations from the start and taught me many useful tips to write a successful academic paper that I didn't know before. She is a very sweet professor who makes class interesting and worth to learn from. I enjoy the little exercises from the workbook and peer edit sessions.
